MERKO.AT.summary: Mermeren Kombinat AD engages in the mining, processing, and distribution of marble and decorative stones in Macedonia and internationally. The company operates five quarries located to the northeast of the city of Prilep. Its products are used in various projects, including mosques, hotels, palaces, commercial and residential buildings, villas, artworks, etc. The company was founded in 1946 and is headquartered in Prilep, North Macedonia.
